statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x - 2 , 12 \, x^{3} + 15 \, x^{2} + 18 \, x - 13 , -2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 4 , 12 \, x^{3} + 14 \, x^{2} + 14 \, x - 12\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
